name: for rox. â™¥
description:
here you go, bby! :D 

install this too, after you install the theme:
http://userstyles.org/styles/41538
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   { Body{ color:#00000 !important; font-size:12px !important; background-image:none !important } a, a:visited{color:#666 !important} a:hover{color:#333 !important} #dashboard_index, #dashboard_edit_post, #dashboard_submissions, #dashboard_drafts, #dashboard_post_queue,#dashboard_likes, #dashboard_followers, #dashboard_following, #dashboard_members, #main_tag_beta, #dashboard_upload_static_file, #main_about, #main_doc_page, #main_themes, #main_meetups, #main_jobs, #main_directory_page, #dashboard_settings, #dashboard_goodies { background-image:url('http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h388/OhOhOverMe/Edits/Picnikcollage-8.jpg') !important; background-repeat:repeat-x !important; background-attachment:fixed !important; background-color:#3a1433 !important; background-position:top } #dashboard_index div.l-content,#dashboard_submissions div.l-content,#dashboard_drafts div.l-content,#dashboard_post_queue div.l-content,#dashboard_likes div.l-content,#main_tag_beta #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;}

div.l-content.l-content.l-content { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important; } #dashboard_edit_post{ background-color: #3a1433 !important } #left_column #posts .post .permalink { background-color:#2f1029 !important; } #left_column #posts .post .post_avatar, #left_column #posts .post .sub_avatar .sub_avatar_inner { background-color: #fbfbfb !important; border-bottom-color: #1f0b1b !important; } #left_column #posts .post{ border-bottom:3px #1f0b1b solid !important } #nav .nav_item.active, #nav .nav_item .nav_menu, #nav .nav_item .nav_item_nipple .nav_item_nipple_pixel { background-color:#5d3556 !important; background-image:none !important; border:0px !important; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important; } #nav .nav_item { color:#ccc !important; } #nav .nav_item:hover { color:#fff !important; } #nav .nav_item .nav_menu { border-bottom:0px !important } #nav .nav_item .nav_menu a { color:#ccc !important; border-top:0px !important; } #nav .nav_item .nav_menu a:hover { color:#fff !important; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.8) !important; } #footer{ color:#666 !important; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important; background-image:none !important; text-shadow:none !important } .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header, h1.dashboard_header a, h1.dashboard_header span { color:#ccc !important } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item { border-bottom:5px solid rgba(39,14,34,0.5) !important; background-image:none !important } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item a, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a { color:#888 !important; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a.tracked_tag_control { color:#ccc !important ; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_nav_title{color:#ccc !important} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_nav_title a{color:#ccc !important} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_radar_media_fold { background: none !important; } #show_radar a, #hide_radar a, #hide_recommended_blogs a, #show_recommended_blogs a { color:#666 !important; background: none !important; } #dashboard_controls_radar_media{background: none !important;} #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important; border:0px !important} #suggested_blog_avatar_1,#suggested_blog_avatar_2,#suggested_blog_avatar_3{border:0px !important} .dashboard_controls_suggested_blog{border:0px !important} #left_column #posts .notification { background-color:#fbfbfb !important; color:#666 !important; border-bottom-color: #eee !important } #left_column #posts .notification .block { color:#333 !important; } #left_column #posts .notification.alt { background-color: #f7f7f7 !important; } #left_column #posts .notification.last_notification, #left_column #posts .notification.single_notification { border-bottom-color:#2c0d26 !important; } #left_column #posts .notification a { color:#565656 !important; border-bottom:0px !important; } #left_column #posts .notification blockquote { border-left-color:#eee !important; } #left_column #posts .notification .avatar { border-color:transparent !important; background-color:#fbfbfb !important; opacity:0.5 !important; } #left_column #posts .notification .avatar:hover{ opacity:1 !important; } #dashboard_switch_blog_menu{ background-color: rgba(25,7,22,0.9) !important; text-shadow:none !important; border:0px !important } #dashboard_switch_blog_menu_header, #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_and_divider,.dashboard_switch_blog_menu_item,#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_footer { text-shadow:none !important; border:0px !important } .dashboard_switch_blog_menu_item:hover{ background-color: rgba(25,7,22,1) !important; } #dashboard_switch_blog_menu_footer{ background-color: rgba(25,7,22,1) !important; } #new_post_notice_container{ color:#fff !important; background-image: none !important; } #new_post_notice_container a{ color:#fff !important; } #dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current, #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_and_divider, #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current { background-image:none !important } .notification_type_icon{ display:none !important } h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#555555 !important} .new_post_label{ text-transform: lowercase !important; font-family:Georgia !important; font-size: 14px !important; font-style:italic !important; margin-top:8px !important; } ol#posts li.post.new_post { background: #ffffff url: ('http://i51.tinypic.com/2dgssqo.jpg') center center no-repeat; } img[src*="http://assets.tumblr.com/images/new_post_icons_no_labels.png"]{ width:0; height:70px; padding-right:250px; opacity: 0; } .sub_avatar{width:32px !important; height:32px !important; background-color:transparent !important} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a { color:#777 !important; text-shadow: none !important; margin:0px !important; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a:hover{ color:#fff !important; text-shadow: none !important; } #logo { height: 0 !important; width: 0 !important; /* these numbers match the new image's dimensions */ padding-left: 218px !important; padding-top: 49px !important; background: url(http://i54.tinypic.com/xatqc7.jpg) no-repeat !important} }
